name: Hotel 6
description:
Hotel 6 

Chaos on the rooftops, Hotel 6 is a top down shooter game where your objective is to shoot down as many enemies as possible. Take control of Ashlyn and mow down some enemies on  the rooftop of Hotel 6 using a selection of different weapons (AR, Shotgun, SMG, MG) and secondary abilities such as a deployable turret, slow motion and rage mode.

Key Features:

- Great visuals 

- "Pick- up and play" game mechanics
